channel.title: Fred-Brooks on Kevin Kelly
channel.description: Recent content in Fred-Brooks on Kevin Kelly

item.title: [Book] The Mythical Man-Month: Essays on Software Engineering
item.author: kevink2019@gmail.com (Kevin Kelly)
item.content:encoded:
The Mythical Man-Month: Essays on Software Engineering, Anniversary Edition

A classic on software leader, Fred Brooks discusses his experience and the lessons he learned on the IBM OS/360 project. Jeff Atwood says it best on his reading list:

“Computers may change, but people don’t.”

— Jeff Atwood
